title: BugSplat after Update
body:
Just updated and game crashed :/
Anyone else?

replies.body: Unfortunately, that image doesn't tell me a whole lot.  Assuming in this case that it's either happening when launching the client or when loading the game, you may have bad game files or drivers.  Go through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune things up as well as repair potentially corrupt game files.  I hope that helps!
